price: 199. (Muuji cafis iyo masaamax oo) qaado waxa fudud (ee la heli karo dhib la’aan), amarna wanaagga, kana jeeso jaahiliinta.
arabic: خُذِ ٱلۡعَفۡوَ وَأۡمُرۡ بِٱلۡعُرۡفِ وَأَعۡرِضۡ عَنِ ٱلۡجَٰهِلِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: khudhi al-ʿafwa wamur bil-ʿur'fi wa-aʿriḍ ʿani al-jāhilīna
